price: 59. Bapengwi bakanisa te ete tozangaki kozua bango na maye basalaki, bakokoka kokima biso te.
arabic: وَلَا يَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَبَقُوٓاْۚ إِنَّهُمۡ لَا يُعۡجِزُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walā yaḥsabanna alladhīna kafarū sabaqū innahum lā yuʿ'jizūna
